mapper.select: select id ,comment_counts ,create_date ,summary ,title ,view_counts ,weight ,author_id ,body_id ,category_id from article where id = #{id}
select id, title, create_date from article order by view_counts DESC limit #{size}
select id, title, create_date from article order by create_date DESC limit #{size}
SELECT YEAR( FROM_UNIXTIME( create_date / 1000 )) AS YEAR, MONTH ( FROM_UNIXTIME( create_date / 1000 )) AS MONTH, count(*) AS count FROM article GROUP BY YEAR,MONTH ORDER BY YEAR,MONTH DESC
